resources.string: Are you sure to delete the item
- To use KasirBarcode please complete the Profile Data> Enter Goods in the Warehouse, then you can use KasirBarcode.

1. Business Name to be set in Profile. 
2. Cashier Admin Name. \N3. The Warehouse menu is a menu that will hold all the items that you have for the purpose of the transaction. 
4. Cashier Menu Barcode is a menu for selling items that you have entered in the Warehouse. 
5. Transaction menu is a menu to view completed transactions in the CashierBarcode menu. 
6. The Profile Menu is a menu for changing user data to be used in KasirBarcode. 
7. Barcode menu is a menu to create a barcode, if the item does not have a barcode.

1. Store or other name 
2. Store or other address 
3. Store or other Telephone Numbers 
4. Name of Cashier who will use CashierBarcode 
5. Currency to be used at CashierBarcode 
6. To rate the CashierBarcode Application 
7. To share the Application with your friends 
8. How to use CashierBarcode 
If you want to change your data press on points 1-5

1. Fill in the data to be used at CashierBarcode 
2. Select the currency to use CashierBarcode 
3. Button to save data

1. Collection of Items to be used in the CashierBarcode menu. 
If you want to change item data, please press and hold the item you want to change 
2. Button to add items you have.

Item data must be filled in. 
1. The price will be used in the CashierBarcode menu. 
2. To open the camera and photograph the items you have 
3. The product photos will be displayed here. 
4. Button to store item data.

1. Camera to read barcodes of goods that you have entered at the warehouse. 
2. Number of items to be purchased. 
3. Total items to be purchased. 
4. Button to search for items according to the name of the item you have entered at the warehouse.

1. Column to search for items you have entered in the warehouse. 
2. List of items to be purchased. if the item you want to buy press on the item selected. 
3. Button to search for items to be purchased at CashierBarcode.

1. Number of items to be purchased. 
2. Total items to be purchased. 
3. List of items to be purchased. 
4. Amount of Money Received. 
5. Button to complete the purchase. 
6. Button to search for items to be purchased at CashierBarcode.

1. User Data that has been changed in the Profile menu. 
2. List of items that have been purchased and their totals. 
3. Button to add items to be purchased. 
4. Button to return to the main menu. 
5. Button to download / print a list of items that have been purchased. 
6. Button to share the list of items that have been purchased.
If Tap appears, Cashier Barcode cannot read the item Barcode. \nIf you want to activate it again press on the TAP screen. \n

1. Column to search for transactions that have been carried out at CashierBarcode. 
2. List of Transactions that have been done at CashierBarcode. 
 If you want to see the list of items press and hold on the selected transaction.
1. List of Barcodes that have been created. \n2. Button to create a Barcode. \n
